Subsection.Text: On entry of judgment or decree, the clerk shall prepare the judgment roll consisting, to the extent filed, of the following:

Paragraph.Text: The agreement or provision for arbitration and each written extension of the time within which to make the award;
A copy of the order confirming, modifying or correcting the award; and
A copy of the judgment or decree.

Subsection.Text: The judgment or decree may be docketed as if rendered in a civil action.
